Room.Name: Imperial Chamber of Lord Kree
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large cylindrical room on the highest level of the tower.
Room.LongDescription: This is a cylindrical room with a magnificent 360 degree view of the city below. From this height, the crystal buildings below look like mere dots on the ground and the people are all but indistinguishable. The chamber itself is simple in design, with a turning throne chair as it's main feature.
